This app demonstrates:

1. Different popover placements (default, right, top, bottom, left, auto)
2. Custom options (like hover trigger)
3. Dynamic content updates
4. Programmatic show/hide control
5. HTML content in popovers
6. Different button styles and icons
7. Interactive elements within popovers
8. Reactive updates to popover content

Key features shown:
- All possible placement options
- Title parameter usage
- Custom options configuration
- Dynamic content updates
- Show/hide control
- HTML content support
- Integration with other UI components
- Various button styles and icons
- Reactive effects for popover control

To run this app:

1. Save it as `app.py`
2. Install required packages:
```bash
pip install shiny
```
3. Run with:
```bash
shiny run app.py
```

The app will demonstrate all the possible parameters and use cases of the popover component in Shiny for Python, using express mode.
